channel.title: Suggestion for moparisthebest.com
channel.description: Hey I was wondering if you could indicate to everyone that the download section is for downloads only.Im tired of posting and reporting saying that this is the wrong section and it's mostly in the download section.They post in there topic "I didn't know if this was in the wrong section".Im sorry for my language but im tired of this crap.They know it's in the wrong section and they are just lazy.I am also suggesting that you guy's (the mods and admins) make harsher punishments for this.It is happening over and over again.Like giving out more warns and mutes and moderates.

item.title: Suggestion for moparisthebest.com

item.description:

end this is mitb,

fr33 pr0stituti0n @ mscp![/quote]

If this doesn’t pertain to you, then don’t post. If you would read above, you would know that this board is for both site discussion of moparisthebest and moparscape.

item.title: Suggestion for moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:13, topic:176888”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=237675.msg2021147#msg2021147 date=1201614671]

I dunno if this is the right section, lol.

Try pm’ing a staff member, or moparisthebest?

I’ve already pm’ed tico and another mod (forgot) lol.

Common sense that download section is for downloads?
Thats what we have mods for.

Yea but people still post there.You go to download section there’s three wrong sectioned topic’s.The mod’s arn’t there quick enough.Either we need more mods on moparscape or harsher punishments.

You expect it locked within 5 seconds?
Go report the topics instead, I barely see anyone reporting wrong section topics lol.
Same about you, so I really so no point of you posting this on some way =
[/quote]

Exaggerated on the 5 seconds part.I do report them but it’s annoying when people put “Im didn’t know it was the wrong section.” When they did know.

[quote author=Lothy link=topic=237675.msg2021141#msg2021141 date=1201614284]

[quote]Cool Ppls:Carly<3,X-J-K-X<33,God Of Ikiliki<3,VoragC<3
Fag/Gay Ppls:Miss Silabsoft(UBER NOOB),client.silabsoft.org
Mmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhm Think big or don’t think at all~[/quote]
Any intelligence that may have been in your post was completely undermined by this ridiculously stupid signature.
[/quote]I think my sig is fine but I guess I will change it if it really helps you.[/quote]
Of course that was exaggerated a bit
Getting more moderators will not get rid of these people or topics/replies really.
Harsher punishments I don’t care right now, that’s for the Global Moderators right now.

item.title: Suggestion for moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Taharok:

Harsher punishments have been done in the past and have had no effect. The stricter the rules and the harsher the punishments the more spam and flaming is made. As long as the staff members keep up their duty and you as a moparscape forum user have patience, I am sure everything will be handled accordingly. Also, to speed up the process (usually) of having the topic investigated, use the ‘Report to Moderator’ link at the bottom of the user’s post of the topic.

I think that speaks for itself. I got your PM by the way. I honestly don’t believe it’s nessecary, as it would be redundant. It’s utter common sense, only downloads belong in the downloads section. Nothing more to be said. If it continues for another few days or so at the pace it is now (or worse) then something will be posted. Other than that, just keep reporting those topics if you see them as it helps us get to them quicker.

Read full topic
